job_history.work_description: Address inquires from employees and management regarding new-hire activity and ongoing employee relation issues. Advise top management on appropriate employee corrective actions. Facilitate regular meetings to develop strategies that positively influence workplace relationships. Recruit and interview applicants daily. Implemented an employee recognition and incentive program. Generate employee tracking reports each week. Work with senior-level management to create fair and consistent HR policies and procedures.

Multi-unit HR business partner upholding Company mission, vision and values system. Support 12 units with over 1000 employees at all levels, including executive leadership. Analyze staffing needs and develop strategies to recruit, train, retain quality talent. Create and utilize job descriptions within all departments. Facilitate meetings to develop strategies that positively influence workplace relationships. New hire and other HR related paperwork compliance. Advise management. Work with operations to establish consistent hiring practices including succession planning.

Coordinated activities of team members in multiple locations. Recruited, trained and developed customer service representatives. Created training manuals. Monitored daily activities of customer support teams. Monitored program compliance to maximize customer satisfaction and manage associates. Provided departmental reports and updates to senior management. Resolved customer questions, issues and complaints.

Developed documentation for common processes. Trained employees company protocols clearly and efficiently. Researched issues to resolve complaints and answer inquiries. Provided technical support. Built and maintained successful relationships with associates, vendors and customers. Mentored associates and managers. Troubleshot issues and worked with associates to accomplish goals.

Met customer needs by effectively resolving food or service issues. Followed procedures for safe food preparation, handling and presentation to ensure customer satisfaction. Maintained sanitation, health and safety standards in work area. Performed monthly inventory control and weekly stock ordering.

skills.name: Human Resource Management
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in HR roles, including HR Generalist and Human Resource Manager, with a proven track record of developing strategies, creating policies, and advising management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Recruitment and Hiring
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in recruiting, interviewing, and hiring employees, as well as developing strategies to attract and retain quality talent, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Proven ability to address employee inquiries, develop strategies to positively influence workplace relationships, and advise management on employee corrective actions, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Experience in creating training manuals, providing technical support, and mentoring associates and managers, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership and Management
skills.explanation: Proven ability to lead teams, develop strategies, and advise management, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management and Organization
skills.explanation: Experience in managing daily activities, creating reports, and maintaining inventory control, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Experience in resolving customer complaints, answering inquiries, and providing technical support, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Some experience in managing projects, including developing strategies and creating reports, but lacking extensive experience, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Budgeting and Financial Management
skills.explanation: Some experience in managing budgets, creating reports, and maintaining inventory control, but lacking extensive experience, indicating some practical experience.
